mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_service_relation r LEFT JOIN tb_service_type t ON t.id=r.service_type_id LEFT JOIN tb_company c ON c.id=r.company_id
and t.type_name like concat('%',#{e.typeName},'%')
ORDER BY r.state DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_service_relation SET state=#{state} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.type_name,a.description,b.state FROM tb_company c LEFT JOIN tb_service_relation b ON c.id=b.company_id LEFT JOIN tb_service_type a ON a.id=b.service_type_id WHERE c.id=#{companyId} and b.state='审核通过'

SELECT c.id id,c.company_name company_name,t.type_name type_name,s.type_name service_type_name,COUNT(i.id) count_num FROM tb_order_info i LEFT JOIN tb_company c ON c.id=i.company_id LEFT JOIN tb_service s ON i.service_id=s.id LEFT JOIN tb_service_type t ON t.id=s.service_type_id WHERE i.user_order_state_id=8 AND c.state='审核通过' GROUP BY c.id ,c.company_name,t.type_name,s.type_name ORDER BY count_num DESC LIMIT 0,6
mapper.delete: DELETE from tb_service_relation WHERE id=#{id} AND state='未审核'
delete from tb_service_relation where staff_id = #{staffId} and service_type_id = #{stId}
mapper.select: select s.* from tb_service s left join tb_service_type st on s.service_type_id = st.id where s.service_type_id = #{serviceTypeId}

select st.id,st.type_name,s.description, s.id s_id,s.type_name s_name,o.order_num, se.level_num,pr.price,pr.unit,pr.deposit,s.icon from tb_service s left join tb_service_type st on st.id = s.service_type_id left join tb_service_relation sr on sr.service_type_id = st.id left join tb_company c on c.id = sr.company_id left join (select o.service_id,count(o.service_id) order_num from tb_order_info o left join tb_service s on s.id = o.service_id where o.company_id = #{companyId} and o.company_order_state_id = 4 GROUP BY o.service_id) o on o.service_id = s.id left join (select s.id s_id,round(avg(se.evaluation_level)/5*100,1) level_num from tb_service_evaluation se left join tb_service s on s.id = se.service_id where se.company_id = #{companyId} GROUP BY se.service_id) se on se.s_id = s.id left join (select pr.* from tb_service s left join tb_price_relation pr on pr.service_id = s.id where pr.company_id = #{companyId}) pr on pr.service_id = s.id where c.id = #{companyId} ORDER BY s.id

select st.id,st.type_name,s.description, s.id s_id,s.type_name s_name,o.order_num, se.level_num,pr.price,pr.unit,pr.deposit,s.icon from tb_service s left join tb_service_type st on st.id = s.service_type_id left join tb_service_relation sr on sr.service_type_id = st.id left join tb_company c on c.id = sr.company_id left join (select o.service_id,count(o.service_id) order_num from tb_order_info o left join tb_service s on s.id = o.service_id where o.company_id = #{companyId} and o.company_order_state_id = 4 GROUP BY o.service_id) o on o.service_id = s.id left join (select s.id s_id,round(avg(se.evaluation_level)/5*100,1) level_num from tb_service_evaluation se left join tb_service s on s.id = se.service_id where se.company_id = #{companyId} GROUP BY se.service_id) se on se.s_id = s.id left join (select pr.* from tb_service s left join tb_price_relation pr on pr.service_id = s.id where pr.company_id = #{companyId}) pr on pr.service_id = s.id where c.id = #{companyId} ORDER BY o.order_num desc limit 0,3
